Quickstrike/Quasar:






Hearing Black Arachnia's voice, Quickstrike opened his optics. It 
caught him off-guard with a small jolt. He was skittish with his odd 
damage that didn't repair right, not wanting anyone near him, because 
if they knew what was going on, they would have him killed. Damaged, 
incapable bots were to be killed. It was a Predacon tradition.

"Huh? What?" He looked around, with his vision a little better. He 
sat up, on his side. 





Quasar looked out towards the horizon, her optics following tracks 
made by Tankor. Quite a few bots went with him. She turned and went 
back inside the ice cave, claimed by her Predacon group. She made 
sure the door behind her was closed tightly. 

"Where did tank boy and the others go?" Not many were left.
